anxiety-1.text: I am safe and protected in this moment.

anxiety-2.text: I breathe in peace and exhale fear.

anxiety-3.text: I trust in my ability to handle whatever comes my way.

stress-1.text: My mind is clear and focused.

stress-2.text: I release all tension and embrace peace.

stress-3.text: I am capable of handling any challenge with grace.

anger-2.text: I release anger and embrace compassion.

anger-3.text: I am the master of my emotions, not their slave.

grounding-1.text: I am rooted and stable like a tree.

grounding-2.text: I am centered and balanced in all aspects of my life.

grounding-3.text: I am unshakeable in my inner strength and peace.

sadness-1.text: I allow myself to feel and heal.

sadness-2.text: My heart is open to love and compassion.

sadness-3.text: I transform pain into wisdom and strength.

confidence-1.text: I am worthy of all good things.

confidence-2.text: I embrace new opportunities with courage.

confidence-3.text: I am unstoppable in pursuing my dreams.

peace-1.text: I am at peace with myself and the world.

peace-2.text: My mind and body are relaxed and calm.

peace-3.text: I surrender to the flow of life with complete trust.

gratitude-1.text: I am grateful for all the blessings in my life.

gratitude-2.text: Joy flows through me and radiates to others.

gratitude-3.text: I am a magnet for abundance and happiness.

focus-1.text: My attention is sharp and unwavering.

focus-2.text: I absorb knowledge with ease and clarity.

focus-3.text: I am a master of concentration and focus.

letting-go-1.text: I release what no longer serves me.

letting-go-2.text: I accept what is and flow with life.

letting-go-3.text: I am free from all attachments and limitations.

loneliness-1.text: I am connected to all beings through love.

loneliness-2.text: I am never truly alone; I am one with the universe.

loneliness-3.text: I am complete and whole within myself.

restlessness-1.text: I find peace in the present moment.

restlessness-2.text: I am calm and centered despite external chaos.

restlessness-3.text: I am the eye of the storm, peaceful and still.

energy-1.text: I am filled with vibrant, positive energy.

energy-2.text: My energy flows freely and powerfully.

energy-3.text: I am an unstoppable force of positive energy.

creativity-1.text: I am a channel for divine creativity.

creativity-3.text: I am a limitless source of creative expression.

clarity-1.text: My vision is clear and my path is illuminated.

clarity-2.text: I see through all illusions to the truth.

clarity-3.text: I am a beacon of clarity and wisdom.

protection-1.text: I am surrounded by divine protection.

protection-2.text: I am safe and secure in all situations.

protection-3.text: I am an impenetrable fortress of light and love.

motivation-1.text: I am motivated by my highest purpose.

motivation-2.text: I move forward with determination and passion.

motivation-3.text: I am an unstoppable force of positive action.

patience-2.text: I am patient with myself and the process.

patience-3.text: I am the master of patience and divine timing.

renewal-1.text: I am reborn with each new day.

renewal-3.text: I am a phoenix rising from the ashes of the old.

self-love-1.text: I love and accept myself completely.

self-love-2.text: I am worthy of love, respect, and happiness.

self-love-3.text: I am a magnificent being of infinite worth.

wisdom-1.text: I am open to receiving divine wisdom.

wisdom-2.text: I understand the deeper meaning of all experiences.

wisdom-3.text: I am a vessel of infinite wisdom and knowledge.

healing-1.text: I am healing on all levels of my being.

healing-2.text: My body, mind, and spirit are in perfect harmony.

healing-3.text: I am a powerful force of healing and restoration.

termsAndConditions.title: Terms & Conditions
termsAndConditions.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using our service

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using the Emotion Mantra Mapping application, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.

serviceDescription.title: 2. Service Description
serviceDescription.content: Emotion Mantra Mapping is a mantra practice and spiritual awareness application that provides:

features.mantras: Traditional Sanskrit mantras for emotional healing and spiritual growth
features.breathing: Guided breathing exercises for relaxation and focus
features.affirmations: Positive affirmations to support mental well-being

userAccounts.title: 3. User Accounts
userAccounts.content: When you create an account with us, you must provide information that is accurate, complete, and current at all times. You are responsible for:

responsibilities.accuracy: Maintaining the accuracy of your account information
responsibilities.security: Safeguarding your password and account security
responsibilities.notify: Notifying us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account

privacy.title: 4. Privacy
privacy.content: Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy, which also governs your use of the service, to understand our practices.

disclaimers.title: 5. Disclaimers
disclaimers.content: The information on this application is provided on an 'as is' basis. To the fullest extent permitted by law, we exclude:
disclaimers.notMedical: This application is not intended to replace professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment
disclaimers.noGuarantee: We make no guarantees about the effectiveness of mantra practice or spiritual awareness practices
disclaimers.userResponsibility: Users are responsible for their own mental and physical well-being

limitation.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: In no event shall Emotion Mantra Mapping, nor its directors, employees, partners, agents, suppliers, or affiliates, be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses, resulting from your use of the service.

termination.title: 7. Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend your account and bar access to the service immediately, without prior notice or liability, under our sole discretion, for any reason whatsoever and without limitation, including but not limited to a breach of the Terms.

changes.title: 8. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time. If a revision is material, we will provide at least 30 days notice prior to any new terms taking effect.

contact.title: 9. Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms & Conditions, please contact us through the application or at our support email.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.subtitle: How we collect, use, and protect your personal information

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: This Privacy Policy describes how Emotion Mantra Mapping collects, uses, and protects your personal information when you use our mantra practice and spiritual awareness application. We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal data.

informationWeCollect.title: 2. Information We Collect
informationWeCollect.content: We collect information you provide directly to us and information we obtain automatically when you use our service.

personalInfo.title: Personal Information
personalInfo.email: Email address for account creation and communication
personalInfo.name: Display name and profile information

usageData.title: Usage Data
usageData.sessions: Mantra practice session data (duration, repetitions, notes)
usageData.analytics: Usage patterns and app performance data

howWeUse.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.content: We use the information we collect to:

purposes.service: Provide and maintain our mantra practice services
purposes.analytics: Analyze usage patterns to improve our service
purposes.improvement: Develop new features and enhance existing ones

dataSharing.title: 4. Information Sharing
dataSharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties except in the following circumstances:

scenarios.service: With service providers who assist us in operating our application
scenarios.legal: When required by law or to protect our rights and safety
scenarios.consent: With your explicit consent for specific purposes

dataSecurity.title: 5. Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information:

measures.encryption: Data encryption in transit and at rest
measures.access: Limited access to personal information on a need-to-know basis
measures.backup: Secure data backup and recovery procedures

yourRights.title: 6. Your Rights
yourRights.content: You have the following rights regarding your personal information:

rights.access: Access your personal data we hold
rights.deletion: Request deletion of your personal data
rights.portability: Receive a copy of your data in a portable format
rights.restriction: Restrict processing of your personal data
rights.objection: Object to processing of your personal data

cookies.title: 7. Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience, analyze usage, and provide personalized content. You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences.

dataRetention.title: 8. Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to provide our services and fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, unless a longer retention period is required by law.

children.title: 9. Children's Privacy
children.content: Our service is not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you are a parent or guardian and believe your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us.

changes.title: 10. Changes to Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the 'Last updated' date.

contact.title: 11. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us through the application or at our support email.
